author: jerenkrantz
msg: The -L and -R flags are linker flags not libraries.  We need to add them to
the correct variable (LDFLAGS) so we can fix 'em up later on.

author: brianp
msg: Rearranged the log_request_time() code to eliminate the allocation
of an 8KB buffer on the stack when not using a custom time format

author: dougm
msg: add is_parent() routine and use it in the END block when scanning for core files
